item.title: For Green Hosting, Come to Papa
item.description: HostPapa is a great option for green hosting, offering impressive value for your money. For less than $4 per month on a 3-year plan, you get a free domain, no setup fees, unlimited domain hosting, and free advertising credits to boost your web marketing. You might wonder about limitations on storage and bandwidth, but there are none! HostPapa provides unlimited disk space and monthly bandwidth, similar to cloud hosting but with a much lower fixed monthly fee.
